%%{HealthTech_LabAnalyzer}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [HealthTech_PatientRecords] --> Created: Create Todo
    Created --> InProgress: Start Work
    Created --> Cancelled: Cancel
    InProgress --> OnHold: Pause
    InProgress --> Completed: Complete
    InProgress --> Cancelled: Cancel
    OnHold --> InProgress: Resume
    OnHold --> Cancelled: Cancel
    Completed --> [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
    Cancelled --> [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]

    state Created {HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault] --> Draft
        Draft --> ReadyToStart: Finalize
        ReadyToStart --> [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
    }

    state InProgress {HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] --> Started
        Started --> InReview: Submit for Review
        InReview --> Started: Request Changes
        InReview --> [HealthTech_PatientRecords]: Approve
    }

    state OnHold {HealthTech_EMR_Sync] --> Blocked
        [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> Deferred
        Blocked --> [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]: Unblock
        Deferred --> [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]: Prioritize
    }

    state Completed {HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> Done
        [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> PartiallyDone
        Done --> [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        PartiallyDone --> [HealthTech_PatientRecords]
    }
